thread.title: The vendor who became the community's eyes and ears
thread.title_full: The vendor who became the community's eyes and ears | News24

author: news24.com
title: The vendor who became the community's eyes and ears
text:
Cape Town - Simphiwe Mabuwa, 45, goes beyond the call of duty as a vendor for The Big Issue and Funny Money salesman at the intersection between Newlands Avenue and Dean Street in Newlands, Cape Town.
Over the five years he has worked in the area, he has also taken on the role of community watchman and good friend to many passers-by, reports GroundUp .
He is hard to miss as he saunters proudly along the middle of the road, smiling broadly, one hand wrapped around a stack of The Big Issue magazines and the other waving at familiar faces.
 Simphiwe Mabuwa greets a potential customer at the traffic intersection. (Photo by Juliette Garms, GroundUp)
